verses.name: Judges 16:10
verses.text: And Delilah said unto Samson, Behold, thou hast mocked me, and told me lies: now tell me, I pray thee, wherewith thou mightest be bound.

verses.name: Judges 16:11
verses.text: And he said unto her, If they bind me fast with new ropes that never were occupied, then shall I be weak, and be as another man.

verses.name: Judges 16:12
verses.text: Delilah therefore took new ropes, and bound him therewith, and said unto him, The Philistines be upon thee, Samson. And there were liers in wait abiding in the chamber. And he brake them from off his arms like a thread.
